title.rendered: Deutsche Bank Team sensitises children on Water Conservation

content.rendered: The Deutsche Bank team joined us in conducting an awareness session on ‘Water Conservation’ for government school children in Jaipur, Rajasthan. The students enjoyed the session as they learned in a fun way. This session was part of our ongoing collaboration with Deutsche Bank which is helping bring primary healthcare services right to the doorsteps of children and families through 7 Smile on Wheels mobile healthcare units in Mumbai, Jaipur, Bengaluru and Pune.
